tokenizeTabs() - Method in HmtTokenizer

tokenizeTabString(String, String) - Method in HmtEditorialTokenization

trimWord(String) - Method in HmtTokenizer
Removes 'ancient markup' from a StringBuffer, that is, non-whitespace characters that are valid in an HMT text, but not part of tokens (such as puncutation).
